title: Riot Games
body: Riot games please, how can I enter the PBE? your explain right because I do not understand much

replies.body: PBE signups are currently down for maintenace.  You can bookmark the [PBE status page](http://status.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/#pbe) for updates.  Once it's in the clear, you should be able to sign up and enter!
